home.hero.title: Pharmaly
home.hero.subtitle: The complete business operating system for modern pharmacies. Streamline operations, prevent theft, automate workflows, and scale across multiple branches with enterprise-grade technology.
home.features.title: Everything Your Pharmacy Needs to Thrive
home.features.description: From inventory management to HR automation, Pharmaly OS provides a complete suite of enterprise-grade tools designed specifically for modern pharmacies.
home.features.inventory.title: Advanced Inventory Management
home.features.inventory.description: Real-time tracking, batch/lot management, expiry alerts, automated reordering, and multi-location inventory with shelf mapping and barcode scanning.
home.features.drugIndex.title: Public Drug Index
home.features.drugIndex.description: Customer-facing drug search portal with comprehensive information on medications, active ingredients, pricing, and manufacturer details for informed decisions.
home.features.antiTheft.title: Anti-Theft & Drug Movement Tracking
home.features.antiTheft.description: Comprehensive movement engine tracks every drug with staff accountability, risk scoring, suspicious activity alerts, and forensic audit trails.
home.features.multiBranch.title: Multi-Branch Management
home.features.multiBranch.description: Manage multiple pharmacies from one platform. Inter-branch transfers, centralized reporting, and complete tenant isolation for security.
home.features.automation.title: Workflow Automation Engine
home.features.automation.description: Create custom automation rules for low stock alerts, expiry notifications, staff scheduling, and more. Save hours of manual work daily.
home.features.hr.title: Complete HR System
home.features.hr.description: Attendance tracking, shift management, payroll with commission calculation, performance scoring, and comprehensive training modules.
home.features.pos.title: Advanced Point of Sale
home.features.pos.description: Fast invoicing, prescription management, patient profiles, loyalty wallets, and integrated payment processing with real-time reporting.
home.features.analytics.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics
home.features.analytics.description: Command center dashboard with KPIs, risk insights, revenue forecasting, staff performance analytics, and custom report builder.
home.features.security.title: Enterprise Security & Compliance
home.features.security.description: Role-based permissions, granular access control, comprehensive audit logging, data encryption, and regulatory compliance built-in.
home.features.growth.title: Growth & Referral System
home.features.growth.description: Doctor and clinic referral tracking, revenue attribution, performance leaderboards, and automated commission calculations.
home.capabilities.title: 50+ Enterprise Features & Counting
home.capabilities.description: A comprehensive suite of capabilities designed to handle every aspect of pharmacy operations.
home.pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
home.pricing.description: Flexible pricing designed to grow with your pharmacy business. All plans include core features with increasing capabilities.
home.pricing.starter.name: Starter
home.pricing.professional.name: Professional
home.pricing.enterprise.name: Enterprise
home.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Pharmacy?
home.cta.description: Join hundreds of pharmacies already using Pharmaly OS to streamline operations, prevent losses, and grow their business. Start your free 14-day trial todayno credit card required.
home.footer.description: The enterprise operating system for modern pharmacies. Built with cutting-edge technology to help your pharmacy thrive.
